caller_intent: The caller wanted to make a payment for an insurance account associated with Johnny Alberto Ruiz Aranda.
resolution_steps: Agent verified the account name and type (generability).
Agent confirmed payment method (debit card) and collected card details (number, expiration date, CVV).
Agent sent a receipt to the caller.
summary: Caller made a payment for Johnny Alberto Ruiz Aranda's insurance account using a debit card. Agent verified details, processed the payment, and sent a receipt. The call concluded with the caller confirming no further assistance was needed.
